Binary: librime-bin, librime-dev, librime-plugin-charcode, librime-plugin-lua, librime-plugin-octagram, librime1t64
Build-Depends: dpkg-dev (>= 1.22.5), capnproto, cmake (>= 3.12), darts, debhelper-compat (= 13), googletest <!nocheck>, libboost-dev, libboost-locale-dev, libboost-regex-dev, libcapnp-dev, libgoogle-glog-dev, libleveldb-dev, liblua5.4-dev, libmarisa-dev (>> 0.3), libopencc-dev (>= 1.1.9+ds1-3~), libutfcpp-dev (>= 3.2.4), libxcb-keysyms1-dev, libyaml-cpp-dev (>= 0.6.3-7~), pkgconf, x11proto-core-dev, zlib1g-dev
Description: Rime Input Method Engine RIME is the acronym of Rime Input Method Engine. . RIME is a lightweight, extensible input method engine supporting various input schematas including glyph-based input methods, romanization-based input methods as well as those for Chinese dialects. It has the ability to compose phrases and sentences intelligently and provide very accurate traditional Chinese output. RIME's cross-platform core library is written in C++, and can work consistently on different platforms with OS-specific wrappers.
Package-List: librime-bin deb utils optional arch=any librime-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any librime-plugin-charcode deb libs optional arch=any librime-plugin-lua deb libs optional arch=any librime-plugin-octagram deb libs optional arch=any librime1t64 deb libs optional arch=any
